root.hap.util

Class KeyUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.hap.util.KeyUtilities

  • public class KeyUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

    This is a utilities class which provides tools relevant to key-based operations. A data key refers to a block of vector header data used in most MapReduce tasks in this application.

    All methods in this class are static and must be executed in a static context on a String containing a data key.

    Since:
    2013.06.02
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly

    • Method Detail

      • explode

        public static java.lang.String[] explode(java.lang.String key,
                         boolean expectsValue)

        Split a key into its component parts.

        Generally a key takes the form (row,col,level,ID,val)

        Parameters:
        key - the key to explode
        expectsValue - should this method expect a 4th field for value
        Returns:
        a simple String array indexing the key's contents, generally in the format [row,col,ID,val]

      • explode

        public static java.lang.String[] explode(org.apache.hadoop.io.Text key,
                         boolean expectsValue)

        Split a key into its component parts.

        Generally a key takes the form (row,col,level,ID,val)

        Parameters:

      • getInstance

        public static org.apache.hadoop.io.Text getInstance(java.lang.String index,
                                    java.lang.String level,
                                    java.lang.String id)

        Construct a custom instance of a key. Assumes no value field.

        Parameters:
        index - row value
        level - column value
        id - key id (R, S, A)
        Returns:
        custom instance of a key
